FetchUsers
SELECT
  USER_ID,
  USER_NAME
FROM
  USERS
WHERE
  USER_TYPE = :type
  AND
  STATUS = 'ACTIVE'

SELECT
  *
FROM
  EMPLOYEES E
WHERE
  E.DEPT_ID = :deptId

Orders
SELECT
  ORDER_ID
FROM
  ORDERS
:_WHERE_AND
(
  ORDER_DATE >= :fromDate,
  ORDER_DATE <= :toDate
)

-- コメント行はそのまま出力される

SubQueryExample
SELECT
  C.CUSTOMER_ID,
  (
    SELECT
      COUNT(*)
    FROM
      ORDERS O
    WHERE
      O.CUSTOMER_ID = C.CUSTOMER_ID
      AND
      O.STATUS IN('NEW', 'HOLD')
  ) AS ORDER_COUNT
FROM
  CUSTOMERS C
WHERE
  EXISTS
  (
    SELECT
      1
    FROM
      PAYMENTS P
    WHERE
      P.CUSTOMER_ID = C.CUSTOMER_ID
      AND
      P.AMOUNT > 1000
  )
